item.description: This month, we are taking our classic monthly Apéro to the European level to give all Europe-loving people an opportunity to come together and socialize in our cozy ballroom, with complimentary wine and cheese! About L'Apéro (short for l'apéritif) (n) désigne le moment de convivialité où des personnes se retrouvent pour discuter. (noun) a friendly get-together where people enjoy libations and conversations. Admission is $10 for everybody. 21+ only.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Wine and Cheese Party
